column4: anyone? I installed bubuntu blue theme on my ubuntu desktop but its still brown when I log in - specifically - between gdm loginscreen and loading desktop
the settings are applied as you login
I have logged in several times ... I dont know how to fix it ... screen goes brown during login process, although I have blubuntu theme .. I need to change some background .png somewhere ??
have you installed the sound codecs in the ubuntu "new use" instructions
